Package gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta

The "meta" package is an effort to develop a metadata

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BusinessObjectDescriptor<T> Descriptor of a business object.
BusinessObjectDescriptorOwner Owner of a BusinessObjectDescriptor
BusinessObjectValidationExpression A BusinessObjectValidationExpression contains an expression that can be evaluated against a business object instance.
 

Class Summary
BasicBusinessObjectDescriptor<T> Set of properties that describes a bean.
ConversionUtils Utilities about conversion.
DescriptorUtils Utility class.
Mediator Mediator is the intermediate that gets or sets the values of properties described by BoPropertyDescriptor objects.
Meta Utility class.
MetaSession ThreadLocal info for Bo2UtilsMeta.
ValidatorRegistry Global store for validators.
